## Online Meeting Scheduling:

The Zoom meeting Link is generated and Agenda Documents are generated . This is then sent to the invited parties through email

## Physical Meeting Scheduling:

Agenda Documents are generated . This is then sent to the invited parties through email

## Event ID storing
The calendar IDs are stored for future referencing such as calendar monthly event deletion

## Deleting Previous Month Schedule
Data Table was used to comapare stored records and  the schedules fetched
